h2.div: Check out the stories as they develop!
Follow our school hashtag #USD274 to see all the Tweets about the great things our students are doing!

div.p: Click here to learn more about the Challenge Award that Middle School and Elementary School Received

h3.div: Key Request & Facility Use Request has gone digital! Click on the "District Office" down arrow to the left and then click either "Use of Facilities Form" or "Key Request" to start the process.
